Claim: "A white dog with a blue collar plays with a red ball."
Implication: "A dog is playing with his toy."
Referring expressions: White dog, blue collar, red ball.  A dog, his toy
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsWhite(a) and HasBlueCollar(b) and PlaysWith(c))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsPlayingWith(d,e))))
